page.title: 03TRADE:MOONFLEET HOTEL:FLEET
page.content: THE{MOONFLEET HOTEL}IS A VERY LARGE BUILDING WITH OVER FIFTY ROOMS.IT ALSO HAS MANY {ENTERTAINMENTS}OPEN TO THE PEOPLE STAYING THERE.YOU CAN ALSO GET A SEASON TICKET WHICH ENABLES YOU TO USE ANY OF THE{ENTERTAINMENTS} BETWEEN APRIL AND NOVEMBER.THERE IS A PLAYPARK IN THE WOODS AND A BMX TRACK.THERE IS ALSO A LARGE CARPARK. THE SWIMMING POOL IS SIXTEEN YARDS LONG AND HAS A SLIDE.THERE IS ALSO A POLYGYM,A SAUNA AND A TABLE TENNIS TABLE.OUTSIDE THERE IS A TENNIS COURT AND A SANDPIT.THERE IS ALSO A COURTYARD.IN THE SUMMER THEY HAVE BARBECUES AND DISCOS.DOWNSTAIRS THERE IS A DISCO AREA WITH A BAR.THERE ARE TWO OTHER BARS UPSTAIRS.INSIDE THE{ {HOTEL}THERE IS A SNOOKER TABLE WHICH YOU ARE NOT ALLOWED TO USE UNLESS YOU ARE OVER FOURTEEN.
